description:
This plugin has been recently acquired by Zeroqode - please bear with us while we review the code and make improvements/fixes where necessary.

This Plugin makes use of the Contextual Web Search API:  https://serpstack.com/documentation 

This Plugin allows you to create your own search engine from scratch or integrate a search functionality into one of your apps.

You can Sign Up for a free API Key via https://serper.dev/dashboard.

[color=#0000ff][size=4]âœ¨[b]FEATURES:[/b][/size][/color]

On version 1.4.0 - we changed the used API and added a few more API calls:

- Video Search,
- Image Search,
- News Search,
- Shopping Search,
- Places Search
